author: Glen I
title: The Beaumont
text:
A great hotel with exceptionally nice staff, everyone extremely attentive and polite.
We came for a night for my wife's birthday and they had prepared her a little cake as a surprise which was a nice touch. Really nice old fashioned bar, didn't try the restaurant as we ate out but if it is anything like the rest if the hotel it will also be great.
Spa treatments were also worthwhile whilst you're here. Would highly recommend staying and would definitely stay again, highly impressed.
Glen
